sections.text:
44-3908.Rules and regulations.

The director may adopt and promulgate rules and regulations for the effective administration of sections 44-3901 to 44-3908 pursuant to the Administrative Procedure Act.

SourceLaws 1982, LB 274, ยง 8;Laws 2018, LB743, ยง 23.

Cross ReferencesAdministrative Procedure Act, see section 84-920.
